summary: Refined Metalogic_v2 proofs across 5 phases: removed 81 #check statements, consolidated duplicate definitions (contextToSetLocal, unused definitions in Basic.lean and Provability.lean), improved documentation with cross-references and known issue documentation, optimized SoundnessLemmas.lean (581->523 lines, 10% reduction), and improved Closure.lean structure (806->790 lines). Lake build succeeds with all 977 jobs.

artifacts.summary: Removed 46 #check statements for cleaner hub module
Optimized axiom validity proofs with tauto and one-liners (10% reduction)
Improved documentation, added helper lemma, documented double-negation issue
Implementation summary with verification results and metrics
